attributes.action: Kenneth Dalglish to receive a knighthood for services to charity and football
attributes.additional_details: Kenneth Dalglish to be knighted for being a brillant footballer and servant for Liverpool football club. Also for the charitable work he does with the Marina Dalglish appeal and by the work he has done with the families of the 96 fans who died in the Hillsborough disaster. This man went to 4 funerals a day for the 96 familes.
